'''''Amon Hen'' 70''' is the seventieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in November [[1984]].

[[Christopher Tolkien]]'s article "'Moria Gate'...Another Look" includes a quote from [[Letter to Rayner Unwin (12 October 1972)|a 1972 letter to Rayner Unwin]] from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=65790 Amon Hen 70. 1984] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 10 October 2011)</ref>
